resources.string: Welcome to the Frequency Time Sheet App
The Frequency time sheet app allows you to log your time digitally at one place, where all your information is secure. No more manual keying in or messy papers.
We have a graphic here,to show welcome
Please enter your phone number. Remember that you must be already authorised by your employer to use this application
Do some plumbing work on the 8th floor
Do some electrician work on the 5th Floor
Hello there, just make sure that these details are correct. A verification code will be sent to your registered phone number
You have been assigned to more than one job in this project. Please select the job you\'re working on right now.
